extendedInfo.description: Associated Luxury Hotels (ALHI) has been serving the Meetings, Incentives and Events industry for over 25 years with Global Sales Services for its worldwide portfolio of over 140 hotels and resorts. The Industry Advisory Council meeting, an annual private event, brings this Council of meeting professionals together with executives from ALHIâs distinctive portfolio of hotel members. This three-day long business and networking event is highly renowned by many in the Hospitality industry as one of the most prestigious events of the year. *NOTE: Due to the private nature of the event, a password will be required to access this app once downloaded. If you have been invited to this event, you should have received your password via e-mail. If you have misplaced your password, please contact the meeting planner.
